title: Momentum of an object moving in positive direction

content.question: An object of mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is moving in the positive <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-direction with an initial speed <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Starting at time <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, a time-varying force <math alttext="F" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with initial magnitude <math alttext="F sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is exerted on the object in the positive <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-direction. Measurements of the force as a function of time are represented in the graph above. Which of the following statements is true about the motion of the object between <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="t equals t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The momentum of the object has decreased to zero at time <math alttext="t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The momentum of the object has increased by approximately <math alttext="one half, F sub 0, end sub, times t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The momentum of the object has decreased by approximately <math alttext="one half, F sub 0, end sub, times t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The momentum of the object at time <math alttext="t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="m times v, plus F sub 0, end sub, times t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The momentum of the object has increased by approximately <math alttext="one half, F sub 0, end sub, times t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
